name: A-Maze-Thing
description:
Watch as mazes are procedurally generated. A-Maze-Thing was created as a submission for Procedural Generation Jam 2016. The objective of the game is simple, move the blue square to the red one. There is an indication of the minimum amount of moves to solve the maze but the main focus is simply to relax and go through as many mazes as you want.

There are also controls which allow you to specify the size of the mazes created or randomizing the size each round.

It was a lot of fun creating this and I hope you will have some fun with it.

Relax and enjoy.
